>
[Final Blade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1094)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Night of the Gray Death</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Death" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=40" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 53, [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 40
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A Large or smaller restrained or willing creature can be executed by a _final blade_. 

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 1 minute (Interact);     **Effect** You execute a creature restrained beneath the blade. The creature you execute takes 11d10 slashing damage and must succeed at a DC 45 Fortitude save or be decapitated as though it suffered a critical hit with a natural 20 from a _+3 major striking [vorpal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=308)_ scythe. The soul of a creature executed with a _final blade_ is trapped, and the creature can't be returned to life, not even by [_miracle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=196) or similar magic. A _final blade_ can hold any number of souls in this way, and a sufficient number of captured souls forms a monster called a [gray death](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1641).

**Destruction** A final blade can be destroyed via the rare ritual, [blunt the final blade](/Rituals.aspx?ID=69).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
